trans-unit.source: Storage Analytics
trans-unit.target: Storage Analytics

trans-unit.source: Azure Storage Analytics performs logging and provides metrics data for a storage account.
trans-unit.target: Azure Storage Analytics performs logging and provides metrics data for a storage account.

trans-unit.source: You can use this data to trace requests, analyze usage trends, and diagnose issues with your storage account.
trans-unit.target: You can use this data to trace requests, analyze usage trends, and diagnose issues with your storage account.

trans-unit.source: To use Storage Analytics, you must enable it individually for each service you want to monitor.
trans-unit.target: To use Storage Analytics, you must enable it individually for each service you want to monitor.

trans-unit.source: You can enable it from the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>https://manage.windowsazure.com/</linkUri></externalLink>; for details, see <externalLink><linkText>How To Monitor a Storage Account</linkText><linkUri>http://www.windowsazure.com/manage/services/storage/how-to-monitor-a-storage-account/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: You can enable it from the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>https://manage.windowsazure.com/</linkUri></externalLink>; for details, see <externalLink><linkText>How To Monitor a Storage Account</linkText><linkUri>http://www.windowsazure.com/manage/services/storage/how-to-monitor-a-storage-account/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: You can also enable Storage Analytics programmatically via the REST API or the client library.
trans-unit.target: You can also enable Storage Analytics programmatically via the REST API or the client library.

trans-unit.source: Use the <link xlink:href="96701530-7f68-4933-864a-3c019b00288f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="9e42d151-d7eb-40fb-b3ef-ee1b57f83f0f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Queue Service Properties (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="99806684-7d33-4a59-acc2-23aaf460eb31" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Table Service Properties (REST API)</link> operations to enable Storage Analytics for each service.
trans-unit.target: Use the <link xlink:href="96701530-7f68-4933-864a-3c019b00288f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Blob Service Properties (REST API)</link>, <link xlink:href="9e42d151-d7eb-40fb-b3ef-ee1b57f83f0f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Queue Service Properties (REST API)</link>, and <link xlink:href="99806684-7d33-4a59-acc2-23aaf460eb31" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Table Service Properties (REST API)</link> operations to enable Storage Analytics for each service.

trans-unit.source: The aggregated data is stored in a well-known blob (for logging) and in well-known tables (for metrics), which may be accessed using the Blob service and Table service APIs.
trans-unit.target: The aggregated data is stored in a well-known blob (for logging) and in well-known tables (for metrics), which may be accessed using the Blob service and Table service APIs.

trans-unit.source: Storage Analytics has a 20TB limit on the amount of stored data that is independent of the total limit for your storage account.
trans-unit.target: Storage Analytics has a 20TB limit on the amount of stored data that is independent of the total limit for your storage account.

trans-unit.source: For more information on billing and data retention policies, see <link xlink:href="26c306dd-7188-4d72-a5da-33173c364ac9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Billing and Data Retention Policies for Storage Analytics</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information on billing and data retention policies, see <link xlink:href="26c306dd-7188-4d72-a5da-33173c364ac9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Billing and Data Retention Policies for Storage Analytics</link>.

trans-unit.source: For more information on storage account limits, see <legacyLink xlink:href="26df4d89-8289-4b31-aaa0-df971cab9b52" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure Storage Scalability and Performance Targets</legacyLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information on storage account limits, see <legacyLink xlink:href="26df4d89-8289-4b31-aaa0-df971cab9b52" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure Storage Scalability and Performance Targets</legacyLink>.

trans-unit.source: For an in-depth guide on using Storage Analytics and other tools to identify, diagnose, and troubleshoot Azure Storage-related issues, see <externalLink><linkText>Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot Microsoft Azure Storage</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/storage-monitoring-diagnosing-troubleshooting/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For an in-depth guide on using Storage Analytics and other tools to identify, diagnose, and troubleshoot Azure Storage-related issues, see <externalLink><linkText>Monitor, diagnose, and troubleshoot Microsoft Azure Storage</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/storage-monitoring-diagnosing-troubleshooting/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: In This Section

trans-unit.source: Operations on Storage Service Properties
trans-unit.target: Operations on Storage Service Properties

trans-unit.source: Storage Analytics is enabled and configured by using the Set/Get Storage Service Properties operations.
trans-unit.target: Storage Analytics is enabled and configured by using the Set/Get Storage Service Properties operations.

trans-unit.source: These operations are listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: These operations are listed in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Operation
trans-unit.target: Operation

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Sets or updates the properties of the Blob service, including Storage Analytics and the default request version.
trans-unit.target: Sets or updates the properties of the Blob service, including Storage Analytics and the default request version.

trans-unit.source: Gets the properties of the Blob service, including Storage Analytics and the default request version.
trans-unit.target: Gets the properties of the Blob service, including Storage Analytics and the default request version.

trans-unit.source: Sets or updates the properties of the Table service, including Storage Analytics.
trans-unit.target: Sets or updates the properties of the Table service, including Storage Analytics.

trans-unit.source: Gets the properties of the Table service, including Storage Analytics.
trans-unit.target: Gets the properties of the Table service, including Storage Analytics.

trans-unit.source: Sets or updates the properties of the Queue service, including Storage Analytics.
trans-unit.target: Sets or updates the properties of the Queue service, including Storage Analytics.

trans-unit.source: Gets the properties of the Queue service, including Storage Analytics.
trans-unit.target: Gets the properties of the Queue service, including Storage Analytics.
